text:
Ascend Innovations | Data Scientist | Dayton, OH | On-Site | Full-Time

Ascend is a healthcare data and digital company created out of a unique collaboration between the Greater Dayton Area Hospital Association (GDAHA) and Kaleidoscope, a product design firm in Cincinnati. We operate in partnership with three healthcare networks, gaining data access to 25 hospitals and healthcare organizations.

We find creative ways to integrate our capabilities with hospital data, operations, and workflows, as well as identify community or industry opportunities. Hospitals use our services to improve quality, optimize operations, and reduce costs. Meanwhile, community and industry clients rely on us to transform healthcare data into insight and analytic products such as interactive reports, dynamic dashboards, and machine learning algorithms.

We are seeking candidates who are passionate about data science and have an interest in creating advancements in the health sciences industry.

You may qualify if:

- You have a Bachelors or Masters degree in a quantitative discipline (e.g. statistics, mathematics, computer science)

- You have 3+ years of relevant experience in data science

- You are familiar with data-focused programming languages like Python or R

- You've created machine learning algorithms such as regression models, neural networks, and tree-based models

Apply here: http://jobs.jobvite.com/kaleidoscope/job/oEcw8fwe
